summary: EcoPowerHub AI React/Vite frontend deployed to ICP asset canister; current production shows only minimal static text due to missing generated PNG assets (and possibly React mount/bundle issues). Scope now includes restoring/regenerating the full set of visual assets and ensuring they are deployed correctly under frontend/public/generated with proper asset-canister headers.
architectural_notes: Static image assets must live in frontend/public/generated so Vite includes them and ICP asset canister serves them at /generated/*.
Ensure .ic-assets.json5 is packaged with frontend/dist and includes correct MIME/cache headers for PNG/SVG/JPG and other static assets.
All static assets must use exact, case-sensitive filenames as referenced by the frontend; do not rename or adjust casing when adding to frontend/public/generated.
known_issues: Production site renders only minimal static text; expected React UI and visuals are missing due to absent generated PNG assets (and possibly React not mounting).
generated/ PNG asset set is missing from the project download/build output, causing 404s and fallback background in hero.
